Nov 17 (Reuters) - CNH Industrial NV CNHI.MI:

  • IVECO TO SUPPLY 1,064 GAS-POWERED S-WAY TRUCKS TO AMAZON TO SUPPORT EUROPEAN OPERATIONS

  • AMAZON ALREADY TOOK DELIVERY OF FIRST BATCH OF 216 UNITS IVECO S-WAY CNG AND ANOTHER 848 UNITS HAVE BEEN ORDERED WITH DELIVERIES TO BE STARTED IN MIDDLE OF 2022

Further company coverage: CNHI.MIAMZN.O


(Gdansk Newsroom)
